DOC.brief_title: Listening Songs Composed Pregnancy Reduces Prenatal Anxiety Depression : Pilot Study
DOC.detailed_description: Prenatal anxiety depression negative implication mother develop child , include developmental disorder , low birth weight , alter immune function . It therefore important detect help ameliorate symptom anxiety depression pregnant woman . Many woman want pharmacological intervention time , less severe symptom may appropriate . Thus need find non-pharmacological method intervention . Psychological therapy cognitive behavioural therapy interpersonal therapy effective . But often available large number woman could benefit . Though evidence music ability reduce anxiety , study quantitatively measure prenatal anxiety depression long period time . Proof efficacy could justify investment music inexpensive , non-stigmatizing method reduce prenatal anxiety depression therefore benefit mother child .
